description:
A desktop web server
for smart devs
Develop locally. Demo publicly. Done effortlessly. 

Work smarter with Fenix
Visual web servers
Create and manage web servers with a beautiful GUI

Persist multiple servers
Save server settings for instant recall later on

One-click sharing
Create a secure public link to share your local work with colleagues and clients

Realtime Configuration
Update server settings with simple toggles

Intuitive CLI / API
Automate server creation and configuration programmatically

Remote Imports
Import code from the cloud directly into Fenix
summary: A desktop web server. for smart devs. Develop locally. Demo publicly. Done effortlessly.
author: Ecor Ventures LLC
